name: Fei Se
description: She's hard to pin down, but the moment you wish to see her, she gracefully appears.

set.2: After using any flame weapon skill or discharge, increase all attack by **14%**/16%/18%/20% for **4** seconds. This set effect works in the off-hand slot. Only the set with the highest star rating will take effect.
set.4: When equipped with at least **1** flame weapon, increase all elemental damage by **14%**/17%/20%/23%. After creating Fei Se's Phantasia, additionally increase final damage by **9%** for **5** seconds. This set effect works in the off-hand slot. Only the set with the highest star rating will take effect.
